forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
